title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in olive oil until crispy.
Whisk eggs and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with pancetta and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful and aromatic chicken curry cooked in a rich, spiced sauce.
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic in oil until golden.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season and serve hot with rice.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fry packed with colorful veggies and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes.
Pour in soy sauce and toss until coated.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious beef tacos with fresh toppings and a tangy salsa.
ingredients: Lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese for topping
instructions: Cook ground beef and onion in a skillet until browned.
Add chili powder and mix well.
Spoon mixture into taco shells.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A healthy and tasty avocado toast topped with poached eggs and herbs.
instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread mixture on toast and top with poached eggs.
Garnish with fresh herbs.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy and soft pancakes served with syrup and berries.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk in milk and egg until smooth.
Heat butter in a pan and pour batter in small circles.
Flip when bubbles form and cook until golden.
Serve with syrup and berries.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: A simple yet delicious grilled salmon with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Marinate salmon in lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Grill for 4-5 minutes on each side.
Garnish with fresh dill and serve.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies with a gooey center.
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whisk in sugar and eggs until smooth.
Fold in flour and pour into a baking pan.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Cool, slice, and serve.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing Greek salad with feta cheese, olives, and fresh veggies.
instructions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, feta, and olives in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss well.
Serve chilled.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
summary: A quick and tasty shrimp fried rice with vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a pan and cook shrimp until pink.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Stir in rice, soy sauce, and scrambled eggs.
Cook for another 3 minutes and serve hot.
